column5: Looks like a very nice trip, beauty pictures and nice speckle. Thanks for posting. My guess 21 1/2"

OK ... I admit to the long-arm technique ... but it came out fabulously .. dont ya think...  And no .. that was not me in the video ... I was the voice behind the video... Wayne has it right ... Scotch all the way for me ... that was most certainly a Beer aided episode (of course the driver was 100% sober)  ... although I believe a bottle of Belvanie was involved as a prelude ... and so far the weight of 2lbs is actually the closest ...
By the way .. we have two spots open for our August trip ....
2.2 lbs?
2.21 lbs

According to the 1927 US Postal Service scales (Purchased on ebay several years ago) she was exactly 1 lb 15 3/4 oz...after burping up a couple oz of water and was exactly 19.25" ....the big fish for the weekend.
Great report.  If only i had longer arms.

So instead of a long drawn out report ... I thought I'd post a couple of shots that would speak for themselves .. and then .. of course the money shot ... prize to the first guy who guesses the actual size and length of the fish - no trick photography .. at least no tricks we dont all use  Pretty views of the Mountain lake at our little camp ...       A little Barbeque with the Boys ...    A little Vino ...    Long Long night .. and the morning after ...     All the boys (at least the boys would could be there this weekend ...       And of course the money shot ....
25.25 inches...
Nice looking trip. Looks like a pretty civilized affair.  181/4", 2.94lb's
Not bad for a Speck eh fellas !
looks like you guys had a blast!  20 1/2 - 3.5 pounds  TDunn
Beautiful camp you guys got there. I'll go 28 1/4 at 4lbs
nice fish congrats on that beauty  23 1/2 is my guess
What a great place to spend with the lads!!!.....nice Speck to!
My guess would be about 26.5 inches
21.9 Inches and 5.25 lbs.
I may have been a hair off, can I change my answer?  191/4", around 3lb's give or take.
24in, 3.5lbs.
<object width="500" height="405"><param name="movie" value="
LOL!!!  How much beer was out in that boat?
Beer ? What beer ?
It was a joke (ie the guys looked slap happy drunk)
23"  3.3lbs  Looks like a hell of a trip
Um...I'm guessing he was being sarcastic Billy.  Camilji is that you in the video? Whoever it is bears a disturbing resemblance to douG.
Everyone knows Jon's a Scotch kinda guy...
i'd say it's about 21 inches.  around 3 lbs.  although the straight arm technique makes it look about 6 lbs.
22" and 3.5lbs.  Nice fish!!
4 pounds 6 ounces....22 1/4 inches ....what did i win????
That's a sweet looking camp and one serious brookie! Nice work.
16 inches, 2 lbs
